name: crysisrecruits
//: To deploy lambda, run `npm run pack`. The deploy package lands in the /dist folder; deploy the zip to lambda from aws-cli or web

scripts.pack: rimraf ../dist/lambda && rimraf node_modules && mkdirp ../dist/lambda && npm install --omit=dev && bestzip ../dist/lambda/crysisrecruits_lambda.zip index.*js node_modules app config integration model repository service
